Contact Us

For your convenience, we've assembled this list of links to help address some of the most frequent requests for information we receive.

  • Find out about student admissions.
  • Make an appointment to tour the College.
  • Get directions.
  • Discover employment opportunities.
  • Contact Alumni Relations.
  • Contact Corporate Relations.
  • Refer to a list of Student Services.
  • See listing of administrative units and departments at the College.
  • Refer to MCommunity, the U-M online directory of faculty, staff & students.
  • Find out about IT resources at the College.
  • Complete a form to submit an event for the College of Engineering website calendar.
  • Send email to submit a news story idea.

If you wish to contact us by phone, the general information number for the College is: (734) 647-7000.
